summary: Adds a full greenhouse and vegetable plot to the side of Breezehome in Whiterun including a chicken coup round the back of the house and Clucky the chicken.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Bert Breezehome Greenhouse[/u]

This mod adds a full greenhouse and vegetable plot to the side of Breezehome in Whiterun including a chicken coup round the back of the house and Clucky the chicken.
All the vegetables, greenhouse flowers, and eggs respawn three game days after being picked/harvested.
Clucky the chicken will respawn after three days should you feel like chicken tonight!!
You can even tend your vegetable patch using the hoe or activate clucky to give him a bit of feed!

This mod may conflict (visually) with other Whiterun mods (though most go together fine) but should not cause any game-breaking problems!!
This mod does not work with Open Cities! It does not cause any problems, it just wont show up!


To install either copy the <Data> folder in this zip into your Skyrim install directory and click yes when told this folder already exists to merge them or use Nexus Mod Manager to do it for you!

Many thanks to IsharaMeradin for her easy-to-follow guide for 1st/3rd person checking!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25936#content

berticus0001


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Other Mods By Me!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15801]Berts Breezehome Cellar[/url]
Adds an open (no loadscreen) cellar to Breezehome with a full set of crafting and smithing tools plus displays for armour, weapons, dragon masks and dragon claws!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8922]Berts Breezehome Remodeled[/url]
A full remodel of Breezehome including interior, exterior and cellar & so much more!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15806]Berts Breezehome Garden[/url]
A new garden grotto added to Whiterun available as a standalone or connected to the vanilla Breezehome & is also pre-packed with my Cellar & Remodeled mods.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29665]Remo\'s Display Spells[/url]
A collection of spells aimed specifically at making your house a home.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25239/#]Berts Hearthfire Dairy Goods Upgrade[/url]
An upgrade for the dairy goods side of the Hearthfire DLC including milkable cows & goats, crafting milkchurns and cheese maturing.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: berticus0001
